mapper.select: SELECT mer_in.*, mer_file.acq_into_no mer_file_acq_into_no, mer_file.create_time mer_file_create_time, mer_file.file_type mer_file_file_type, mer_file.file_url mer_file_file_url, mer_file.id mer_file_id, mer_file.`status` mer_file_status, add_item.item_name mer_file_name FROM acq_merchant_info mer_in JOIN acq_merchant_file_info mer_file ON mer_in.acq_into_no = mer_file.acq_into_no JOIN add_require_item add_item ON add_item.item_id = mer_file.file_type AND mer_in.id = #{id}
mapper.sql: id, merchant_type, merchant_name, legal_person, legal_person_id, id_valid_start, id_valid_end, province, city, district, address, one_scope, two_scope, charter_name, charter_no, charter_valid_start, charter_valid_end, account_type, bank_no, account_name, account_bank, account_province, account_city, account_district, bank_branch, line_number, acq_into_no, into_source, audit_status, audit_time, create_time, agent_no, one_agent_no, mcc
mapper.insert: insert into acq_merchant_info (id, merchant_type, merchant_name, legal_person, legal_person_id, id_valid_start, id_valid_end, province, city, district, address, one_scope, two_scope, charter_name, charter_no, charter_valid_start, charter_valid_end, account_type, bank_no, account_name, account_bank, account_province, account_city, account_district, bank_branch, line_number, acq_into_no, into_source, audit_status, audit_time, create_time, agent_no, one_agent_no, mcc) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{merchantType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idValidStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{idValidEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oneScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{twoScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{charterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{charterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{charterValidStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{charterValidEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{accountType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lineNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acqIntoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intoSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oneAgentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update acq_merchant_info
merchant_type = #{merchantType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
merchant_name = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
legal_person_id = #{legalPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_valid_start = #{idValidStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
id_valid_end = #{idValidEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
one_scope = #{oneScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
two_scope = #{twoScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
charter_name = #{charterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
charter_no = #{charterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
charter_valid_start = #{charterValidStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
charter_valid_end = #{charterValidEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bank_no = #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_bank = #{accountBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_province = #{accountProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_city = #{accountCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_district = #{accountDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_branch = #{bankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
line_number = #{lineNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
acq_into_no = #{acqIntoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
into_source = #{intoSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
agent_no = #{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
one_agent_no = #{oneAgentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mcc = #{mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update acq_merchant_info set merchant_type = #{merchantType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, merchant_name = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, legal_person_id = #{legalPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_valid_start = #{idValidStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, id_valid_end = #{idValidEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, one_scope = #{oneScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, two_scope = #{twoScope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charter_name = #{charterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charter_no = #{charterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charter_valid_start = #{charterValidStart,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, charter_valid_end = #{charterValidEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank_no = #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_name = #{accountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_bank = #{accountBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_province = #{accountProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_city = #{accountCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_district = #{accountDistrict,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_branch = #{bankBranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, line_number = #{lineNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, acq_into_no = #{acqIntoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, into_source = #{intoSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, agent_no = #{agentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, one_agent_no = #{oneAgentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mcc = #{mcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
